Module Assignment
Package services

Class SuggestionSenderService

java.lang.Object
services.SuggestionSenderService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISuggestionSenderService
public class SuggestionSenderService extends Object implements ISuggestionSenderService
SuggestionSenderService class for managing the sending, editing, and retrieval of suggestions. Implements the ISuggestionSenderService interface.

      Specified by:
      getDraftSuggestion in interface ISuggestionSenderService

    • submitSuggestion

      public int submitSuggestion(String senderID, String campName, String suggestionDetails, boolean isDraft)
      Submits a new suggestion or updates an existing suggestion.
      Specified by:
      submitSuggestion in interface ISuggestionSenderService
      Parameters:
      senderID - The ID of the student submitting the suggestion.
      campName - The name of the camp related to the suggestion.
      suggestionDetails - The details of the suggestion.
      isDraft - True if the suggestion is a draft, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The ID of the submitted or updated suggestion.

    • editSuggestion

      public boolean editSuggestion(int suggestionID, String senderID, String newDetails, boolean isDraft)
      Edits an existing draft suggestion.
      Specified by:
      editSuggestion in interface ISuggestionSenderService
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - The ID of the suggestion to be edited.
      senderID - The ID of the student submitting the suggestion.
      newDetails - The new details for the suggestion.
      isDraft - True if the suggestion should remain a draft after editing, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      True if the suggestion is successfully edited, false otherwise.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      suggestionID - The ID of the draft suggestion to be deleted.
      senderID - The ID of the student submitting the suggestion.
      Returns:
